title: Empanized chicken wings Torado taqueritos and fusion cheese
instructions: Step 1. Mix the spices (salt, pepper, garlic and cumin then marked chicken wings).
Step 2. Rest the marinated wings for half an hour.
Step 3. Crush the two types of taqueritos in a food processor and mix in a bowl.
Step 4. pass the wings through the flour, then through the egg and finally the taqueritos.
Step 5. Heat the oil and fry the wings.
Step 6. Serve the wings on a plate and accompany with the sauces.
